main event: An Air Force officer observed a brilliant white disc-shaped object at Hickam Field, Hawaii on January 6, 1949, for about 28 minutes.
interesting points: The object oscillated continually while circling the area, gaining altitude and increasing speed; It was approximated to be 25 ft in diameter; The sighting was reported by an Air Force officer; The object displayed no audible sound; The object displayed distinctive patterns of movement during the observation.
